text: The Tales of Alvin Maker is a series of books by Orson Scott Card about the experiences of a young man, Alvin Miller, who finds out that he has special powers to make and change things around him. It takes place in an alternate history of the American frontier in the early 1800s and is based on early American folklore and superstition. ==Books== * Seventh Son (1987) * Red Prophet (1988) * Prentice Alvin (1989) * Alvin Journeyman (1995) * Heartfire (1998) * The Crystal City (2003) * Master Alvin (planned) == Other websites== * The official Orson Scott Card website Category:The Tales of Alvin Maker Category:Series of books
